XmlTagTest

    public abstract class RhnBaseTestCase
extends TestCase
    RhnBaseTestCase is the base class for all RHN TestCases. It ensures that the HibernateSession is closed after each test to similuate what happens when the code is run in a web application server.

      • assertNotBefore

        public static void assertNotBefore(java.util.Date earlier,
                   java.util.Date later)
        Assert that the date later is after the date earlier. The assertion succeeds if the dates are equal. Both dates must be non-null.
        Parameters:
        earlier - the earlier date to compare
        later - teh later date to compare
